alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 16 at 12:18AM PST until January 16 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog, with some locations below 200 feet. * WHERE...Caruthers, San Joaquin, Selma, Delano, Wasco, Shafter, Hanford, Corcoran, Lemoore, Visalia, Porterville, and Reedley. * WHEN...Until noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 198, Highway 41, Highway 43, Highway 180 west of Fresno, and Highway 99.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley
